segments.text: My attention is drawn back to the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is so focused on that plate, meticulously drying it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost surreal how calm she appears amidst the growing chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps flowing, completely unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet pouring over the cabinet doors, onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find her lack of awareness almost frustrating to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the water rising around her ankle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite astonishing, really, that she hasn't looked down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water accumulating is considerable by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what thoughts occupy her mind to block out such an obvious sensory input.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps she's lost in a moment of peaceful domesticity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this peace is about to be shattered by a very wet reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit sad for the mess she's going to discover.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of distraction is truly remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR
